dragon...\""},{"lineNumber":210419,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんな話はしてないよ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I wasn't talking about adventurer,"},{"lineNumber":210421,"originalJapaneseLine":"　つけてる装備の一つ一つが伝説の武具だぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"every piece of equipment they have is a legendary weapon.\""},{"lineNumber":210422,"originalJapaneseLine":"「超レア装備で体中ガチガチに固めてんの……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're clad head to toe in ultra-rare gear..."},{"lineNumber":210423,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんな人世の中にいるんだな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"To think such a person exists in the world...\""},{"lineNumber":210424,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ボーッと見ている場合じゃないだす！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, this isn't the time to just be staring blankly!"},{"lineNumber":210425,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このままじゃ危ないだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"It'll be dangerous like this.\""},{"lineNumber":210426,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えー、助けに行くとかはちょっと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, going to help is a bit...\""},{"lineNumber":210427,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うっ……そりゃおらも怖いだすが……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... I'm scared too, though...\""},{"lineNumber":210428,"originalJapaneseLine":"「＜エール＞様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"<Eiru>-sama...\""},{"lineNumber":210429,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………。」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":210430,"originalJapaneseLine":"「い、行かないだすか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A-aren't you going to go?\""},{"lineNumber":210431,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、そういうシビアなところ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, that serious side of yours"},{"lineNumber":210432,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お父様にそっくりだすな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"really reminds me of Father...\""},{"lineNumber":210433,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、こうなればおら一人でも……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-if it comes to this, I'll go alone...\""},{"lineNumber":210434,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はいだ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes!\""},{"lineNumber":210435,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うう、さすが＜エール＞様、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh, as expected of <Eiru>-sama,"},{"lineNumber":210436,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とっても勇気がおありだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"you have such great courage!"},{"lineNumber":210437,"originalJapaneseLine":"　おら感動しましただ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm moved!\""},{"lineNumber":210438,"originalJapaneseLine":"「じゃあ早速……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Then, right away...\""},{"lineNumber":210439,"originalJapaneseLine":"「来るな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't come any closer!\""},{"lineNumber":210440,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひい！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":210441,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これは私の戦い……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is my battle...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だしょー！？
ちょー楽しいんですけどー、みたいな！」
「ちょーちょー、
なに格好つけちゃってるの？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: what are you trying to act cool for?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なになになーにー？
＜エール＞ちゃんそーゆーお年頃？」
「おっ？
言葉失っちゃった系？」
「くくく、＜エール＞ちゃんもまだまだ子供だなー」
「ふふふ……」
あなたと長田君は
わいわいと賑やかに喋りながら
翔竜山をひたすら登っていく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as you steadily climb Mount Shoryu.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、鳴き声のようなものが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, something like a cry

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 辺りに響き渡った。
「わ、わ、ちょ、なに！？」
「あ、見るだす！
あそこ！」
ロッキーの指さす先には一人の女性が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At the spot Rocky points to, there's a woman,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: グリーンドラゴンと向かい合っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: facing off against a Green Dragon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大なドラゴンの咆哮を叩きつけられて尚、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after being struck by the roar of the huge dragon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その女性の表情は涼しげだった。
「ふんっ！」
ドラゴンの噛みつき攻撃を素早くかいくぐり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She swiftly dodges the dragon's biting attack,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 巨大な両手持ちの大剣を軽々と使いこなし、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: easily wields a huge two-handed greatsword,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドラゴンの顔を中心に傷を作り続ける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continuously inflicting wounds centered on the dragon's face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その一つ一つはとても致命傷には届かないが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Each wound isn't fatal by itself,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダメージは確実に蓄積されていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but the damage is steadily accumulating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つタイミングが狂えば致命傷を食らうのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If her timing is off even once, she could suffer a lethal blow,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 女性の方にも関わらず、
薄い笑みすら浮かべていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: she had even a faint smile on her face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あれ？　あの人……」
「うわっ、すげぇなあの人……
なあ、＜エール＞？」
「ああ、ドラゴン相手に一歩も引いてねぇの……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah, they're not backing down an inch against the dragon..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんな話はしてないよ！？」
「多分、あの冒険者、
つけてる装備の一つ一つが伝説の武具だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: every piece of equipment they have is a legendary weapon."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「超レア装備で体中ガチガチに固めてんの……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "They're clad head to toe in ultra-rare gear...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんな人世の中にいるんだな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To think such a person exists in the world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、ボーッと見ている場合じゃないだす！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, this isn't the time to just be staring blankly!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このままじゃ危ないだ」
「えー、助けに行くとかはちょっと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Eh, going to help is a bit..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うっ……そりゃおらも怖いだすが……」
「＜エール＞様……」
「い、行かないだすか？」
「うう、そういうシビアなところ、
お父様にそっくりだすな……」
「こ、こうなればおら一人でも……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-if it comes to this, I'll go alone..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はいだ！」
「うう、さすが＜エール＞様、
とっても勇気がおありだ！
おら感動しましただ！」
「じゃあ早速……」
「来るな！」
「これは私の戦い……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
